parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Poll interval. Use zero to disable automatic polling.

parameter.name: inputAddress
parameter.label: Input Register Address
parameter.description: Start address of the input (function 3) register block

parameter.name: inputBlockLength
parameter.label: Input Block Length
parameter.description: Length of the modbus input (function 3) block in 2 byte words (modbus registers)

parameter.name: maxTries
parameter.label: Maximum Tries When Reading
parameter.description: Number of tries when reading data, if some of the reading fail. For single try, enter 1.

parameter.name: holdingAddress
parameter.label: Holding Register Address
parameter.description: Start address of the holding (function 4) register block

parameter.name: holdingBlockLength
parameter.label: Holding Block Length
parameter.description: Length of the modbus holding (function 4) block in 2 byte words (modbus registers)

parameter.name: registerNumber
parameter.label: Modbus Register number
parameter.description: This value is absolute modbus register number starting from 0. It must be within the range specified in thing configuration as address till address + length.

parameter.name: registerFunction
parameter.label: Modbus Register function
parameter.description: This value is designation of modbus function for obtaining value for this channel. Possible functions are 3 - input and 4 - holding
